00019 class CL_Cuda

00023         CL_Cuda_private *pd;

00028 
00029         //! Description buffer in BAR1 space
00030         struct BAR1_BUF
00031         {
00032                 int                     id;                     //!< User id for buffer
00033                 int                     state;          //!< Status of buffer
00034                 size_t          sizeOfBytes;//!< Size buffer of bytes
00035                 int         page_count; //!< Count of pages
00036                 int             page_size;      //!< Size of page
00037                 void*           cuda_addr;      //!< address in CUDA memory
00038                 uint64_t*   phy_addr;   //!< Array of physical addresses of pages
00039                 void**          app_addr;       //!< Array of virtual addresses of pages in the application address space
00040 
00041                 BAR1_BUF()
00042                 {
00043                         id=-1;
00044                         state=0xA00;
00045                         sizeOfBytes=0;
00046                         page_count=0;
00047                         page_size=0;
00048                         phy_addr=0;
00049                         app_addr=0;
00050                         cuda_addr=0;
00051                 }
00052         };
00053 
00054         //! Allocate buffer in CUDA memory and map it in BAR1 space
00055         void AllocateBar1Buffer( int sizeOfKb, BAR1_BUF *pAdr );
00056 
00057         //! Release buffer from BAR1 space and from CUDA memory
00058         void FreeBar1Buffer( BAR1_BUF *pAdr );
00059 
00060 };
